pr_title: Render event annotations with timezone setting of the user

timeline.message:
Render event annotations with timezone setting of the user

Prior to this change, the events were not annotated in the histogram
if the user had a different timezone than UTC. Because the anotations
would be set with UTC and not the user set timezone.

This change will convert the chartdata timestamps to the users setting.

timeline.bodyText:
You can use tz ?? 'UTC' here.
Just to let you know, I started replacing 'UTC' in another PR (#7836) with AppConfig.rootTimeZone();. I thought about replacing it here as well, but we did not merged the mentioned PR and use UTC in comparable cases.
timeline.author: linuspahl

replies.bodyText: I would suggest to replace all occurrences of 'UTC' together to prevent having different timezone again.
replies.author: kmerz
